name: AzureAlerts_GetRiskySignIn
author: csirt@zetes.com
description: Get Risky Sign-ins for a specified user account.

configurationItems.name: tenant_id
configurationItems.description: The unique Id of your Microsoft Azure Tenant

configurationItems.name: application_id
configurationItems.description: The Application Id for the application created in your Azure AD

configurationItems.name: app_secret
configurationItems.description: The App secret to use to authenticate against the Microsoft Identity Service. Either a password or a file path to the certificate key to use.

configurationItems.name: thumbprint
configurationItems.description: The thumbprint generated by Azure AD when you upload your public cert

configurationItems.name: polling_interval
configurationItems.description: Define time interval between two requests attempts for the report
